testcase.name: Pub App id and API URL
testcase.summary: Check Pub App id and API URL
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app

3. Check Pub App id and API URL
step.expectedresults: Pub app id and API URL should be displayed on app.

testcase.name: Start button
testcase.summary: Check start button
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app

3. Tap on Start button.
step.expectedresults:
1.Start button should be displayed on app.

2.After tapping on Start button SDK should get initialized.

testcase.name: Different tabs
testcase.summary:
Check below tabs on the bottom of app.

1.Vungle

2.Logs

3.Callback
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app

3. Check Vungle,Logs,Callback tabs on the bottom of app.
step.expectedresults:
Check below tabs on the bottom of app.

1.Vungle

2.Logs

3.Callback.

testcase.name: SDK Parameters
testcase.summary:
Check below Vungle SDK parameters.

1.Log enabled

2.Winner notification

3. Auto Reload

4. User Consent status
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Open the app.

step.actions:
1.Open the app .

2.Check UI Parameter.
step.expectedresults:
Below parameters should be displayed on app UI.

1.APP ID

2.URL.

3. App version

4. User Consent status

testcase.name: Check for the Download icon after initialization.
testcase.summary: Check for the Download icon after initialization.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.

2. Install the app.

3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid Pub App id.
3. Tap on the start button.
step.expectedresults:
1. Download button should display in front of the Placement Id if the Ad is not cached for the respective placement Id.
2. Play button should displayed in front of the Placement Id is Ad is cached for the respective placement Id.

testcase.name: SDK initialize successfully
testcase.summary: Initialize SDK with valid Pub App id.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.

2. Install the app.

3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid Pub App Id.
3. Tap on start button.
step.expectedresults:
1. SDk should get initialize successfully with 'SDk initialize successfully' message on screen.
2. Get the sdkDidInitialize callback called.

testcase.name: SDK initialize with empty app id.
testcase.summary: Initialize SDK with blank pub app id.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Do not enter pub app Id(leave pub app id blank).
3. Tap on start button.
step.expectedresults: Get the sdkFailedToInitialize callback called. with correct error information.

testcase.name: SDK initialize with invalid app id.
testcase.summary: Initialize SDK with invalid pub app id.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.

2. Install the app.

3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter invalid Pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
step.expectedresults:
1. Get the sdkFailedToInitialize callback called with correct error information.

2. Server will give a 400 http code(for config response) and some error information.

testcase.name: Initialize SDK on below old devices(non supportive OS)
testcase.summary: Initialize the SDk on old devices(non supportive OS)
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter Pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
step.expectedresults: Get the sdkFailedToInitialize callback called with correct error information.

testcase.name: Initialize sdk with network disconnection
testcase.summary: Verify initialization of SDK with network disconnection
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter Pub app id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Disconnect the wifi network during the initialization.
step.expectedresults:
1. The SDK will keep trying to access the /hbConfig with a predefined time intervals.
2. Get the sdkFailedToInitialize callback called until it reach to the maximum count(15).

testcase.name: Verify sdk refresh configuration(/hbConfig refresh timeout)
testcase.summary: Verify sdk refresh configuration(/hbConfig refresh timeout)
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Manipulate refresh parameter value in /hbConfig response.
2. Open the app.
3. Enter Pub app id.
4. Tap on start button.
step.expectedresults: 1.SDK should keep accessing /hbConfig by a predefined time interval(5 min)

testcase.name: Check for the Ad network status
testcase.summary: Check for the Ad network status
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Open the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the app.
2. Open the app
3. Enter Pub App id and API URL
4. Tap on Start tab.
step.expectedresults:
1.Ad should load successfully with different Ad Networks status such as
InMobi - Success
facebook - Fail
Vungle - Success
Admob - Fail

testcase.name: API hbConfig request
testcase.summary: Check request payload of hbconfig API
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Open the app.
3. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid pub app Id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Observe the hbConfig in charles.
step.expectedresults: hbConfig request should contain app info and device information.

testcase.name: API hbConfig response .
testcase.summary: Check response payload of hbconfig API
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Open the app.
3. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1. Open the app.
2. Enter valid pub app Id.
3. Tap on start button.
4. Observe the hbConfig in charles.
step.expectedresults: hbConfig response should contain information about placements and End points.

testcase.name: Response payload of hbConfig
testcase.summary: To check response payload of hbConfig
testcase.preconditions:
1.Install the app.
2.Open the app.
3.Initialize the app

step.actions:
1) Install the App on device and set charles Proxy.
2) Manually initialise the App.
3) Observe response payload of hb config API in the charles Proxy.
step.expectedresults: hbconfig response payload should contains following parameters hb_enabled": true, "config": { "refresh_time": 0, "auction_timeout": 0 hb_endpoints" bid_endpoint": "string", "report_endpoint": "string", "log_endpoint": "string" "placements": [ { "reference_id": "string", "ad_networks":

testcase.name: User Agent of the build.
testcase.summary: Verify User agent of the build.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set a charles proxy.
2. Install the app.
3. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Open the app.

2. Enter valid Pub app Id.

3. tap on start button.

4. Verify the user agent of the build in the header of APi.
step.expectedresults:
User agent should display properly.

eg. User-Agent - VungleHBS/0.9.0;native

testcase.name: Load interstitial successfully after sdk initialized
testcase.summary: Call sdk api to load interstitial.
testcase.preconditions: Setup accounts correctly.(vungle, inmobi, admob, facebook, applovin, unity, mopub) The sdk is initialized successfully. (Get sdkDidInitialize called)

step.actions: Create an interstitial object with a valid placement id. Call api to load interstitial.
step.expectedresults: The InterstitialDidLoad callback called with each ad network. (The callback should be called in the main thread)

testcase.name: Load rewarded video ad successfully after sdk initalized
testcase.summary: Call sdk api to load rewarded video ad.
testcase.preconditions: Setup accounts correctly.(vungle, inmobi, admob, facebook, applovin, unity, mopub) The sdk is initalized successfully. (Get sdkDidInitialize called)

step.actions: Create an Interstitial object with a valid placement id. Call api to load interstitial.
step.expectedresults: The InterstitialDidLoad callback called with each ad network.

testcase.name: User consent status is unknown in non EU countries.
testcase.summary: User consent status is unknown in non EU countries.
testcase.preconditions: Device IP is a non EU country IP. User consent status is unknown.

step.actions:
1. Change device IP to a non EU country IP.
2. In TestApp, choose “User consent status" to unknown (Default)
3. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK.
step.expectedresults:
1. In /v1/hbConfig request, parameter ”consent_status“ is unknown: "user": { "gdpr": { "consent_source": "publisher", "consent_status": "unknown", "consent_timestamp": 0 } }
2. In /v1/hbConfig response, parameter "is_country_data_protected" is false "gdpr": { "is_country_data_protected": false } }

testcase.name: User consent status is accepted in non EU countries.
testcase.summary: User consent status is accepted in non EU countries.
testcase.preconditions: Device IP is a non EU country IP. User consetn status is accepted.

step.actions:
1. Change device IP to a non EU country IP.
2. In TestApp, choose  “User consent status" to accepted
3. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK.
step.expectedresults:
1. In /v1/hbConfig request,   parameter
”consent_status“ is opted_in:
"user": {
                "gdpr": {
                        "consent_source": "publisher",
                        "consent_status": "opted_in",
                        "consent_timestamp": 1536732869
                }
        }
2. In  /v1/hbConfig  response,
parameter "is_country_data_protected"  is false
"gdpr": {
                "is_country_data_protected": false
        }
}

testcase.name: User consent status is denied in non EU countries.
testcase.summary: User consent status is denied in non EU countries.
testcase.preconditions: Device IP is a non EU country IP. User consent status is denied.

step.actions:
1. Change device IP to a non EU country IP.
2. In TestApp, choose  “User consent status"
to denied
3. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK.
step.expectedresults:
1. In /v1/hbConfig request,   parameter
”consent_status“ is opted_out:
"user": {
"gdpr": {
"consent_source": "publisher",
"consent_status": "opted_out",
"consent_timestamp": 1536733015
}
}

2. In  /v1/hbConfig  response,
parameter "is_country_data_protected"  is false
"gdpr": {
                "is_country_data_protected": false
        }
}

testcase.name: User consent status is unknown in EU countries.
testcase.summary: User consent status is unknown in EU countries.
testcase.preconditions: Device IP is a EU country IP. User consetn status is unknown.

step.actions:
1. Change device IP to a EU country IP
(We could use Astrill to switch to Germany IP).
2. In TestApp, choose  “User consent status"
to unknown （Default）
3. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK.
step.expectedresults:
1. In /v1/hbConfig request,   parameter
”consent_status“ is unknown:
"user": {
                "gdpr": {
                        "consent_source": "publisher",
                        "consent_status": "unknown",
                        "consent_timestamp": 0
                }
        }
2. In  /v1/hbConfig  response,
parameter "is_country_data_protected"  is false
"gdpr": {
                "is_country_data_protected": true
        }

testcase.name: User consent status is accepted in EU countries.
testcase.summary: User consent status is accepted in EU countries.
testcase.preconditions: Device IP is a EU country IP. User consetn status is accepted.

step.actions:
1. Change device IP to a EU country IP
(We could use Astrill to switch to Germany IP).
2. In TestApp, choose  “User consent status"
to accepted
3. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK.
step.expectedresults:
1. In /v1/hbConfig request,   parameter
”consent_status“ is opted_in:
"user": {
                "gdpr": {
                        "consent_source": "publisher",
                        "consent_status": "opted_in",
                        "consent_timestamp": 1536732869
                }
        }
2. In  /v1/hbConfig  response,
parameter "is_country_data_protected"  is false
"gdpr": {
                "is_country_data_protected": true
        }

testcase.name: User consent status is denied in EU countries.
testcase.summary: User consent status is denied in EU countries.
testcase.preconditions: Device IP is a EU country IP. User consent status is denied.

step.actions:
1. Change device IP to a EU country IP
(We could use Astrill to switch to Germany IP).
2. In TestApp, choose  “User consent status"
to denied
3. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK.
step.expectedresults:
1. In /v1/hbConfig request,   parameter
”consent_status“ is opted_out:
"user": {
                "gdpr": {
                        "consent_source": "publisher",
                        "consent_status": "opted_out",
                        "consent_timestamp": 1536733015
                }
        }
2. In  /v1/hbConfig  response,
parameter "is_country_data_protected"  is false
"gdpr": {
                "is_country_data_protected": true
        }

testcase.name: Log function enabled
testcase.summary: Log function enabled
testcase.preconditions: Parameter "logging" is enabled in the response of /v1/hbConfig

step.actions:
1. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfulfly
2. Parameter  "logging" is enabled in the response of  /v1/hbConfig
"logging": {
                "enabled": true
        },
step.expectedresults: Vungle Advanced Auction SDK will send the log items to the log endpoint(For qa environment is https://qa-hb.api.vungle.com/v1/logging) ; Each field of metadata in every log item is correct and does not have raw data

testcase.name: Log function disabled
testcase.summary: Log function disabled
testcase.preconditions: Parameter "logging" is disabled in the response of /v1/hbConfig

step.actions:
1. Start Vungle Advanced Auction SDK successfulfly
2. Parameter  "logging" is disabled in the response of  /v1/hbConfig
"logging": {
                "enabled": false
        },
step.expectedresults: Vungle Advanced Auction SDK will not send the log items to the log endpoint(For qa environment is https://qa-hb.api.vungle.com/v1/logging)

testcase.name: Play intersitital after ad loaded(single ad network)
testcase.summary: Call sdk api to play interstitial after single ad network loaded.
testcase.preconditions: network is connected.

step.actions:
1.Create the interstitial object.
2.Load the ad
3.After ad loaded for one ad network, play the ad
step.expectedresults: The first ad network of /bid response should be played

testcase.name: Play interstitial with network , check play ad report
testcase.summary: Play interstitial with network , check play ad report
testcase.preconditions:
1.The interstitial is loaded.

2.Network is connected.

step.actions: Call sdk api to play the interstitial
step.expectedresults:
1.The play report will be sent when ad start to play.

2.Check the report fields are correct.

testcase.name: Play intersitital after ad loaded(multiple ad network)
testcase.summary: Call sdk api to play interstitial after mutiple ad network loaded.
testcase.preconditions: network is connected.

step.actions:
1.Create the interstitial object.
2.Load the ad
3.After interstitial loaded for mutiple ad network, play the ad
step.expectedresults: The first ad network of /bid response should be played

testcase.name: Play interstitial without network , check play ad report
testcase.summary: Play interstitial without network , check play ad report
testcase.preconditions: The interstitial is loaded. Network is disconnected.

step.actions: Call sdk api to play the interstitial
step.expectedresults: 1.The play report will not be sent, and will be sent with next report after network is connected.

testcase.name: Play interstitial with network disconnected
testcase.summary: Call sdk api to play interstitial when network disconnected
testcase.preconditions: network connected.

step.actions:
1.Create the interstitial object.
2.Load the ad
3.Disconnect the network
4.Play the ad
step.expectedresults: The first loaded ad network in the configuration should be played

testcase.name: Play rewarded video ad after loaded(single ad network)
testcase.summary: Call sdk api to play rewarded video ad after single ad network loaded.
testcase.preconditions: network is connected.

step.actions:
1.Create the rewarded video ad object.
2.load the ad
3.after ad loaded for one ad network, play the ad
step.expectedresults: The first ad network of /bid response should be played

testcase.name: Play rewarded video with network, check play ad report
testcase.summary: Play rewarded video with network, check play ad report
testcase.preconditions: The rewarded video ad is loaded Network is connected

step.actions: Call sdk api to play the rewarded video ad
step.expectedresults:
1.The play report will be sent when ad start to play.

2.Check the report fields are correct.

testcase.name: Play rewarded video ad after ad loaded(multiple ad network)
testcase.summary: Call sdk api to play rewarded video ad after mutiple ad network loaded.
testcase.preconditions: network is connected.

step.actions:
1.Create the rewarded video ad object.
2.load the ad
3.after interstitial loaded for mutiple ad network, play the ad
step.expectedresults: The first ad network of /bid response should be played

testcase.name: Play rewarded video without network, check play ad report
testcase.summary: Play rewarded video without network, check play ad report
testcase.preconditions: The rewarded video ad is loaded Network is disconnected

step.actions: Call sdk api to play the rewarded video ad
step.expectedresults: The play report will not be sent, and will be sent with next report after network is connected.

testcase.name: Play rewarded video with network disconnected
testcase.summary: Call sdk api to play rewarded video ad when network disconnected
testcase.preconditions: network disconnected.

step.actions:
1.Create the rewarded video object.
2.Load the ad
3.Disconnect the network
4.Play the ad
step.expectedresults: The first loaded ad network in the configuration should be played

testcase.name: Send unsent play ad report when sdk initialized
testcase.summary: Send unsent play ad report when sdk initialized
testcase.preconditions: There are some play ad report failed to sent, include interstititial and rewarded video ad. The network is connected.

step.actions: Initialize sdk successfully.
step.expectedresults: The unsent play report should be sent by the order they generated.

testcase.name: Close the playing rewarded video ad when ad completes
testcase.summary: Close the playing rewarded video ad when ad finished
testcase.preconditions: network connected

step.actions:
1.Create the rewarded video ad object.
2.Load the ad
3.Play tha ad
4.Close the ad when ad finished
step.expectedresults: The event callback onRewarded should be triggered;

testcase.name: Close the playing rewarded video ad before ad complete
testcase.summary: Close the playing rewarded video ad before ad finished
testcase.preconditions: network connected

step.actions:
1.Create the interstitial object.
2.Load the ad
3.Call api to play the ad in a thread other than main thread
step.expectedresults: The event callback onRewarded should be triggered;
